name: clawpack-skill
description: Backup and restore OpenClaw configuration - pack, unpack, backup, restore, profile management

tools.name: clawpack_pack
tools.description: Pack OpenClaw configuration into a local zip file. Use this when user wants to backup their config without GitHub or transfer to another device via file.

tools.name: clawpack_unpack
tools.description: Unpack OpenClaw configuration from a local zip file. Use this when user wants to restore config from a file they received.

file.description: Path to the pack file (.zip), e.g., 'clawpack-backup.zip' or '/path/to/backup.zip'

tools.name: clawpack_backup
tools.description: Backup OpenClaw configuration to GitHub Gist or repository. Requires GitHub authentication. Good for cloud sync across devices.

full.description: Include complete configuration (not just skills) - recommended

repo.description: Push to a GitHub repository instead of Gist (format: owner/repo)

tools.name: clawpack_restore
tools.description: Restore OpenClaw configuration from GitHub Gist, repository, or named profile.

source.description: Gist ID, profile name (e.g., 'work-mac'), or repo (owner/repo). Optional if user has a default profile.

full.description: Restore full configuration (not just skills) - recommended

tools.name: clawpack_profileList
tools.description: List all backup profiles with their nicknames. Use this to show user their saved configurations.

tools.name: clawpack_profileAdd
tools.description: Add a new backup profile with a nickname. Use this when user wants to save a Gist ID with a memorable name like 'work-mac' or 'home-pc'.

tools.name: clawpack_profileUse
tools.description: Switch to a different backup profile. Use this when user wants to change their default configuration.

name.description: Name of the profile to switch to

tools.name: clawpack_profileRemove
tools.description: Remove a backup profile. Use this when user no longer needs a saved configuration.

name.description: Name of the profile to remove

tools.name: clawpack_status
tools.description: Check clawpack installation status and GitHub authentication. Use this to verify setup.

tools.name: clawpack_list
tools.description: List all installed OpenClaw skills. Shows what would be backed up.
